name: Stars (itch) (ellyeli)
description:
Lost in another endless night of the city. 

What happens when you collect the star shards hidden in the dark?

Hello, this is one of the games I got to create during my level design class! It is a walking simulator with a theme of being on a journey.

Let me know what you think about it, what you enjoyed, and what I can improve in. How you interpreted the story and if the visuals were pleasing? I appreciate all feedback and comments.

Credits
